model

Class SoundBank

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.SoundBank

  • public class SoundBank
extends java.lang.Object
    The class SoundBank stores Sound instances and generates Chord instances.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SoundBank(model.Sound[] sounds) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      model.Chord chord(boolean[] soundFlags)
      Takes a boolean array and returns a Chord instance that represents the sounds from the sound bank in the locations indicated by the array.
      model.Chord chord(int[] soundNums)
      Takes a integer array and returns a Chord instance that represents the sounds Creates a new sound instance and gives it the name of the parameter.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • chord

        public model.Chord chord(boolean[] soundFlags)
        Takes a boolean array and returns a Chord instance that represents the sounds from the sound bank in the locations indicated by the array.
        Parameters:
        soundFlags. - Takes a boolean array.

      • chord

        public model.Chord chord(int[] soundNums)
        Takes a integer array and returns a Chord instance that represents the sounds Creates a new sound instance and gives it the name of the parameter.
        Parameters:
        name. - The String parameter is the new Sound instance's name.
